scheduler_agent.description: Schedules BIM model tasks based on project timelines.
scheduler_agent.how_to_use: Launch from BIMRouteNavigator or automation suite. Triggers project rescheduling.

validator_agent.description: Validates BIM model for compliance and detects clashes.
validator_agent.how_to_use: Triggered during stress test or direct execution.

infinity_patch.description: Self-healing mechanism that monitors and repairs agents automatically.
infinity_patch.how_to_use: Runs continuously or via CLI. Can be manually invoked from control module.
